coconut.season: Year-round in tropical climates; best during monsoon (June-August) for adequate moisture.
coconut.soil: Well-drained sandy loam or coastal alluvial soils; pH 5.0-8.0.
coconut.watering: Regular irrigation during dry spells; avoid waterlogging. Mature trees need 100-120 L/week.
coconut.fertilizer: NPK 12:12:17:2 MgO + micronutrients; apply 1 kg/year of age up to 10 years. Organic compost recommended.
coconut.pests: Rhinoceros beetle, red palm weevil, coconut mite, leaf-eating caterpillar. Diseases: Root wilt, bud rot.

rice.season: Kharif (June-November) for monsoon-dependent; Rabi (November-March) with irrigation.
rice.soil: Clayey loam with good water retention; pH 5.0-6.5. Flood-prone or waterlogged areas suitable.
rice.watering: Continuous flooding (5-10 cm water depth) during growth; drain before harvest.
rice.fertilizer: NPK 100:50:50 kg/ha + zinc sulfate. Split application: basal, tillering, panicle initiation.
rice.pests: Stem borer, brown plant hopper, gall midge. Diseases: Blast, bacterial blight, sheath blight.
rice.yield: 4-6 tons/ha paddy (varies by variety and irrigation).
rice.spacing: 20x20 cm for transplanted rice; 15-20 kg seeds/ha for direct seeding.

rubber.season: Plant at onset of monsoon (May-July) for seedling establishment.
rubber.soil: Deep, well-drained acidic loams (pH 4.5-6.5); avoid waterlogged or saline soils.
rubber.watering: Regular irrigation until maturity (3-4 years); drought-tolerant thereafter.
rubber.fertilizer: NPK 10:10:10 + magnesium; apply 500 g/tree/year initially, increasing to 2 kg for mature trees.
rubber.pests: Abnormal leaf fall, powdery mildew, bird's eye spot. Pests: Termites, mealybugs.
rubber.yield: 1,500-2,000 kg dry rubber/ha/year after 7-8 years (peak at 20-30 years).
